description:
Miyuki recounts for Nagisa the events of the past few years filling in details of the relationship between Shizuma and the now-deceased Kaori whom they have both grieved for over the past three years. As she tells her story she discusses the impact that Kaori`s passing has had on the two of them and reflects as well on the effect that Nagisa`s arrival has also had on them.
Source: crunchyroll
